title: Looking for a plat+ coach ^^
body: I mostly play jungle in ranked but I was wondering is there anyone out there who can teach me some tips likewhen to push a lane,how to gank a lane succesfully etc

replies.body:
not wasting your early game is crucial, look at every stat in the game as a resource, its like in a game of age of empires, you dont want to sit there stockpiling capped resources or something of the like, you want to keep your rates (in-out) as flat/close to zero as possible. effecient resource utilisation & allocation comes down to good./correct decision making. look to push advantages and as your skill increases you're leniancy for fuckups will decrease & and u can snowball early game harder assuming the team is of likewise calibre skill.

have a list of 3 things ud like to do 5-10 minutes then have an idea in that time of 10-20 minutes then so on and so forth major objectives like 18 min mini barron, 23 min first barron or first tower push etc, itemisation, try to avoid doubling up on itemisation asimilar to say ur top lane bruiser if ur playing a jungle bruiser, contribute to the team, provide variation etc

have/create a playstyle, have different gear shifts and be maleably adaptive, sometimes the game operates in start stop stages of operation and sometimes its more congruent. be the ability to recognise when its one or the other and by dynamically proactive accordingly
yeah i can help you out a bit. Plat 2 jungle main here :D {{champion:154}}
